text: tatha yahoodee aur eesaeeyon ne kaha ki ham allaah ke putr tatha priyavar hain. aap poochhen ki phir vah tumhen tumhaare paapon ka dand kyon deta hai? balki tumabhee vaise hee maanav poorush ho, jaise doosare hain, jinakee utpatti usane kee hai. vah jise chaahe, kshama kar de aur jise chaahe, dand de tatha aakaash aur dharatee tatha jo un donon ke beech hai, allaah hee ka raajy (adhipaty)[1] hai aur usee kee or sabako jaana hai
